CUSTOM PAGE HEADER STARTS

WE ARE HOOK LINE & DRINKER
After experiencing the hands-on stress of wondering if a bartending company would meet their stringent requirements at their Halloween-themed wedding in 2017, Hook Line and Drinker founders Chris and Stacy decided an event bartending company would be a great way to help their clients create memorable events that followed their own strict expectations.
Experienced Bartenders in Tampa, Florida
Already sharing a bartending background combining 25 years, owners Chris & Stacy decided to open their own bartending service in 2018. They provide what is often overlooked by other bartending companies. Accommodating client’s needs and delivering top notch service are key components that Chris and Stacy did correctly from the company’s inception.
Stacy and Chris consistently attend industry related expos and events. Hook Line and Drinker team members are also full-time bartenders at busy, mixed demographic establishments that keep them sharp on new drinks and techniques.
Recognized for their expertise and fun attitude, 4 short years later, Hook Line and Drinker is one of the preferred vendors at many of the venues in the Tampa Bay area including The Barn at Lone Oak Acres in Parrish, Florida and Lithia Acres in Lithia, Florida
Exceeding expectations and viewing each event from the hosts perspective, Hook Line and Drinker regularly receives 5-star reviews on Google and Facebook. Proving their desire for nothing short of excellence easily separates them from the competition.

CUSTOM PAGE HEADER STARTS
CUSTOM PAGE HEADER ENDS
Event Bartending Service in Tampa.
We have packages designed to suite your Event. Independently from our packages, Hook Line & Drinker also offers customization & preparation services.
Hook Line & Drinker Package: $400.00
This package includes all of the following:
1 professional bartender for up to 4 hours of service and up to 100 guests
1 mobile bar, if needed. Choice of linen included
Complete bar set up: including shakers & mixing tins, bottle & wine openers, beverage napkins, stir straws, garnish storage tray, bar mats, bar towels
Large cooler for storing beer/ice (ice not included)
Unlimited email communication after signed contract is obtained
$2 Million Liquor Liability Insurance included.
No additional fees for set up or break down
No Stress Mixer Package: $5.00 / person
(
$0.50 per person  for each hour in excess of the standard 4 hours
) NO STRESS MIXER PACKAGE PRICING IS IN ADDITION TO THE HOOK LINE & DRINKER PACKAGE
Includes everything in Hook Line & Drinker package in addition to the following:
9 oz. clear plastic cups
Soda Mixers: Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale, Club Soda & Tonic
Juice Mixers: Orange, Cranberry & Pineapple
Sour Mix
Grenadine
Simple Syrup
Bitters
Lemons & Limes
Water (In dispenser at bar area for bartenders to serve. Not for table glasses or any catering use)
Need Extras? Available Additions:
Additional bartender: $175 (Up to 4 hours)
Additional Bar Set Up: $100 (required if cocktail hour is in a different location than the reception area)
Additional hour: $75 per hour/per bartender
Server/Party helper/Barback $50 per helper/per hour
9 oz. Cups Package: $1.00 per person with a $50.00 minimum (Up to 100 guests, up to 4 hours. $0.50pp/per hour over the 4 hours)
Ice Package: $1.50 per person. (Up to 4 hours. $0.50pp/per hour over the 4 hours. Ice is for bartenders use only. Not for table glasses or any catering use)
Coolers: $15 each
White Acrylic Bar: $200 (delivery fees apply)
Champagne Wall: $250 with flutes, $200 without flutes. Holds 60 flutes, 2 available (delivery fees apply)
30″ Round High-Top Table: $18 each. Spandex linen Included (12 available)
Garnish Package: Limes, Lemons, Oranges & Cherries $1.00 pp with a $50.00 minimum
Beverage Station: $175- Sweet OR Unsweetened Tea, Lemonade. Sweetener, Lemons, Table, Linen and Dispensers included (up to 100 guests, up to 4 hours).
Additional $1.00 per person over 100 guests.
Percolated Coffee Station: $125- Sweetener, Creamers, Stir sticks, Styrofoam cups, Table & Linen included (up to 100 guests, up to 4 hours).
Additional $1.00 per person over 100 guests.
Evaporative Cooling Units: $150 (needs power and water source) (5 available, delivery fees apply)
Propane Heaters: $150 (2 available, delivery fees apply)
Note:
Providing alcohol for any event is the sole responsibility of the event host. Hook Line & Drinker provides only the bartending service**
Travel fees could apply to locations outside of Hillsborough and Pinellas counties depending on distance**
